LanguageData.TM_HealingRainWD.label: healing rain
LanguageData.TM_HealingRainWD.description: A gentle rain with healing properties. Any creature exposed to healing rain will slowly regenerate their wounds.
LanguageData.TM_HailstormWD.label: hail storm
LanguageData.TM_HailstormWD.description: A fierce hailstorm that sheets swathes of land in deadly waves of ice. Movement and accuracy are severely hampered.
